code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./SlidingPuzzleGame.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Puzzle=()=>{const initialTiles=Array.from({length:15},(_,i)=>i+1).concat(null);const[tiles,setTiles]=useState(initialTiles);useEffect(()=>{setTiles(shuffle([...tiles]));},[]);const shuffle=arr=>arr.sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5);const handleTileClick=index=>{const emptyIndex=tiles.indexOf(null);const validMoves=[emptyIndex-1,emptyIndex+1,emptyIndex-4,emptyIndex+4];if(validMoves.includes(index)){const newTiles=[...tiles];newTiles[emptyIndex]=newTiles[index];newTiles[index]=null;setTiles(newTiles);}};const resetGame=()=>{setTiles(shuffle(initialTiles));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"puzzle-game",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sliding Puzzle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"puzzle-grid",children:tiles.map((tile,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`puzzle-tile ${tile?'filled':'empty'}`,onClick:()=>handleTileClick(index),children:tile},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:resetGame,children:"Restart"})]});};export default Puzzle;
